title: Durango Roots: How Chris Blevins and Riley Amos Punched Two Tickets to the Paris Olympics
content:
Since mountain biking became an Olympic sport, the southwestern Colorado city has been represented at the Games.

Read the full article at Durango Roots: How Chris Blevins and Riley Amos Punched Two Tickets to the Paris Olympics on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
